treatment.description: Leaves: largest medial blade margins green, teeth or glands 5–22 per cm, apex acuminate or acute, adaxial surface slightly glossy or dull. Pistillate flowers: adaxial nectary 0.2–1.1 mm; stipe 0.3–0.6 mm; ovary pyriform; styles 0.9–1.8 mm; stigmas 0.2–0.28–0.36 mm.
treatment.habitat: no data are available on flowering time (probably early). boreal floodplains
